---
title: "Time Plots"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
library('astsa')
```

```{r}
help(jj)
plot(jj, main='Johnson and Johnson Quarterly Earnings Per Share', ylab='Earnings', xlab='Quarters', type='o')
```
```{r}
help(flu)
plot(flu, main='Monthly pneumonia and influenza deaths in the U.S.', ylab='Number of Deaths per 10,000 People', xlab='Months', type='o')
```
```{r}
help(globtemp)
plot(globtemp, main='Global Mean Land-Ocean Temperature Deviations', ylab='Temperature Deviations', xlab='Years', type='o')
```
```{r}
help(globtempl)
plot(globtempl, main='Global Mean Land Temperature Deviations', ylab='Temperature Deviations', xlab='Years', type='o')
```
```{r}
help(star)
plot(star, main='Variable Star', ylab='Magnitude', xlab='Days')
```
